text: Do we have MALTAB like deployment tools in Julia?

elements.text: Do we have MALTAB like deployment tools in Julia?

text: There is PackageCompiler.jl which tries to do that. It results in huge files though because there isn't a Julia equivalent of MCR.

elements.text: There is PackageCompiler.jl which tries to do that. It results in huge files though because there isn't a Julia equivalent of MCR.

text: There is also StaticCompiler.jl if you are feeling adventurous.
